item.title: Hello World
item.description:
It is so incredibly easy to set up a personal blog now. I’ve picked:

  • the Hugo static site generator.
  • the XMin theme to go with that.
  • and Github Pages for hosting.

The process is explained in this Quickstart and the Hosting on GitHub Pages guide. I spent about 20 minutes setting this up, and more than that trying to pick a theme.

Happy Blogging!
